statements: SELECT * FROM cabin_availability
SELECT cabin_id, cabin_type FROM cabin_availability WHERE availability = true
SELECT cabin_type FROM cabin_availability WHERE cabin_id = 3
SELECT * FROM cabin_availability WHERE availability = false ORDER BY cabin_id DESC
SELECT cabin_id, cabin_type FROM cabin_availability ORDER BY cabin_type ASC
SELECT * FROM cabin_availability WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT cabin_id, cabin_type FROM cabin_availability WHERE cabin_type = 'Deluxe';
SELECT * FROM cabin_availability ORDER BY cabin_type DESC, cabin_id ASC;
SELECT cabin_id, cabin_type, availability FROM cabin_availability WHERE availability = TRUE AND cabin_type LIKE '%Suite%';
SELECT cabin_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM cabin_availability GROUP BY cabin_type HAVING total_count > 1 ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM cabin_availability WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM passenger_information WHERE age > 18;
SELECT activity_name, activity_type FROM onboard_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Outdoor';
SELECT cabin_id, deck_number FROM cabin_availability ORDER BY deck_number;
SELECT * FROM passenger_information ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM cabin_availability WHERE deck_number = 3 AND availability = TRUE;
SELECT name, age FROM passenger_information WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT cabin_id, deck_number FROM cabin_availability WHERE deck_number = 5 AND availability = TRUE ORDER BY cabin_id;
SELECT * FROM onboard_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Water Sports';
SELECT DISTINCT deck_number FROM cabin_availability ORDER BY deck_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM cabin_availability ORDER BY cabin_id DESC;
SELECT cabin_id, deck_number FROM cabin_availability WHERE availability_status = 'available';
SELECT * FROM passenger_information WHERE booking_reference LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT first_name, last_name, cabin_id FROM passenger_information WHERE cabin_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT activity_name, location, start_time, end_time FROM onboard_activities WHERE end_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM cabin_availability ORDER BY deck_number DESC, cabin_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT cabin_id, cabin_type, availability_status FROM cabin_availability WHERE deck_number > 5 AND availability_status = 'available';
SELECT cabin_id, cabin_type, passenger_id FROM cabin_availability JOIN passenger_information ON cabin_availability.cabin_id = passenger_information.cabin_id ORDER BY cabin_id ASC;
SELECT activity_name, location, start_time FROM onboard_activities WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY start_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, c.cabin_type, c.availability_status FROM passenger_information p JOIN cabin_availability c ON p.cabin_id = c.cabin_id WHERE p.booking_reference = 'ABC123';
SELECT * FROM cabin_availability;
SELECT ship_id, deck_number FROM cabin_availability WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT passenger_id, first_name, last_name FROM passenger_information WHERE age > 30;
SELECT activity_name FROM onboard_activities ORDER BY activity_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM cabin_reservation WHERE reservation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM cabin_availability WHERE deck_number = 3;
SELECT cabin_id, ship_id FROM cabin_availability WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT passenger_id, first_name, last_name, age FROM passenger_information WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cabin_reservation WHERE reservation_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT activity_id, activity_name FROM onboard_activities ORDER BY activity_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Cabin;
SELECT cabin_type, availability FROM Cabin WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT passenger_id, name, age FROM Passenger ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT activity_name, description FROM Activity WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT booking_id, booking_date FROM CabinBooking WHERE booking_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Passenger WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT p.name, c.cabin_type FROM Passenger p INNER JOIN Cabin c ON p.cabin_id = c.cabin_id WHERE c.availability = TRUE;

SELECT p.name, a.activity_name FROM Passenger p INNER JOIN PassengerActivity pa ON p.passenger_id = pa.passenger_id INNER JOIN Activity a ON pa.activity_id = a.activity_id WHERE a.description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM CabinBooking WHERE booking_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT c.cabin_id, COUNT(pb.booking_id) AS total_bookings FROM Cabin c LEFT JOIN CabinBooking pb ON c.cabin_id = pb.cabin_id GROUP BY c.cabin_id HAVING total_bookings > 0;
